docs.snippet: SANTIAGO, Chile, July 21 -- Galo Plaza of Ecuador, Secretary General of the Organization of American States, declared today during the first of four projected trips to Latin America that the region was confronted by a "barrier of silence" that did...
docs.lead_paragraph: SANTIAGO, Chile, July 21 -- Galo Plaza of Ecuador, Secretary General of the Organization of American States, declared today during the first of four projected trips to Latin America that the region was confronted by a "barrier of silence" that did not permit a flow of information on real conditions.
docs.abstract: Sec Gen Plaza Lasso in Santiago on 1st of 4 Latin-Amer tours; deplores 'barrier of silence' that inhibits flow of information to Latin Amers on real econ and pol conditions; scores mil spending

headline.main: LATIN AMERICANS HELD OVERLOOKED; Plaza, on a Tour, Deplores 'Barrier of Silence'
